name: Robo surge
description:
ِِA short game made in 48 hours for the global game jam 2017 [[PostCombo]].

Try to adjust the fans signs to make the ultimate fan wave.

Sorry for the lack of sounds ... it's just that I can't sound.

Tools :

HaxeFlixel, Vscode, GraphicsGale.

Team

Programming : Ali Hassan @alythephantom

Art : Muhammed Hussam @markerChief
